## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# User-specific files (MonoDevelop/Xamarin Studio)
*.userprefs

# Build results
/bin/
/obj/
/out/
/build/

# Visual Studio 2022 auto-generated files
/.vs/

# Build artifacts
*.dll
*.exe
*.app
*.pdb
*.cache
*.mdb

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
# The packages folder can be ignored because of Package Restore
**/packages/*
# except build/ folder
!**/packages/build/
/*.snk

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/

# Rider IDE
.idea/

# Logs
*.log

# Visual Studio profiler
*.psess
*.vsp
*.vspx
*.sap

# ReSharper
_ReSharper*/
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper
*.DotSettings.user

# DotCover
*.dotCover

# Backup & crash files
*.bak
*.tmp

# Publish output
/publish/
/PublishProfiles/

# ASP.NET temp files
aspnetcore-browser-refresh.dat

# Configuration files generated at runtime
appsettings.Development.json
appsettings.Local.json

# macOS files
.DS_Store

# Windows Image File Cache
Thumbs.db
